content: double-layer reversible cable headband pattern by viktoriya loshkarova this headband is a simple yet cozy project perfect for knitters of all skill levels the double-layer design not only provides extra warmth but also offers a stylish reversible look with one side in a smooth knit stitch and the other featuring a classic cable braid this pattern is versatile any medium-weight yarn can be used allowing for endless color and texture possibilities the size is also easily adjustable simply repeat the round sections more or fewer times to achieve your desired fit whether you knit it flat or in the round this headband is a practical and stylish accessory that s both fun and functional needles 3 5 mm yarn medium 4 weight wool/alpaca blend yardage ~6yds per braid section small ~86yds medium ~92yds large ~98yds equipment knitting needles darting needle cable needle scissors small size 19-21″ medium size 21-23 large size 24-25 notes if you don t have a cable needle you can use a darning needle instead when the instructions indicate knitting from the cable needle simply slip the stitches back onto your knitting needle and proceed the first 11 knit stitches are for the reverse plain knit side of the headband while the remaining stitches form the cable braid side working flat cast on 28 stitches row 1 p13 k2 p9 k2 p2 row 2 k2 p2 k9 p2 k13 row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 k2 p2 slip 3 stitches onto cable needle hold to back k3 k3 from cable needle k3 p2 k13 row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 repeat row 1 row 8 k2 p2 k3 slip 3 stitches onto cable needle hold to front k3 k3 from cable needle p2 k13 repeat row 1-8 size repeat small 14 times medium 15 times large 16 times assembly sew the cast-on and bind-off edges together align and sew the plain knit side to the cable side with wrong sides together working in the round cast on 28 stitches and join in the round being careful not to twist work as follows rounds 1-3 k13 p2 k9 p2 k2 round 4 k13 p2 slip 3 stitches onto cable needle hold in back k3 k3 from cable needle k3 p2 k2 rounds 5-7 repeat k13 p2 k9 p2 k2 round 8 k13 p2 k3 slip 3 stitches onto cable needle hold in front k3 k3 from cable needle p2 k2 repeat rounds 1-8 size repeat small 14 times medium 15 times large 16 times assembly sew the cast-on and bind-off edges together happy knitting
